translation.A problem occurred while saving your pay: A problem occurred while saving your payment method.
translation.Access to plan will end on: Access to plan will end on {{date}}
translation.After the trial, cancel no default: After the trial, you will be lose access to {{planName}} plan and your subscription will be cancelled. You will not be charged unless you subscribe to a paid plan during the trial.
translation.After the trial, cancel: After the trial, you will be downgraded to the {{postTrialPlanName}} plan and your subscription will be cancelled. You will not be charged unless you subscribe to a paid plan during the trial.
translation.After the trial, subscribe: After the trial, subscription starts and you will be billed.
translation.When balance reaches X remaining, an aut: When credit balance reaches {{threshold}} remaining, an auto top-up of {{amount}} credits will be processed.
translation.An invoice is created when charges reach: An invoice is created when charges reach {{amount}}; the rest is billed monthly.
{{reason, list(style: 'long'; type: 'disjunction';)}} usage is over the limit.
translation.Cannot downgrade entitlement: Cannot downgrade to a quantity lower than current usage.
translation.Credits to be applied to future invoices: Credits to be applied to future invoices
translation.Current usage exceeds the limit of this: Current usage exceeds the limit of this plan.
translation.Error initializing payment method change: Error initializing payment method change. Please try again.
translation.Error processing payment. Please try a d: Error processing payment. Please try a different payment method.
translation.Error retrieving plan details. Please tr: Error retrieving plan details. Please try again in a moment.
translation.Error updating payment method. Please tr: Error updating payment method. Please try again.
translation.Invalid access token; your temporary acc: Invalid access token; your temporary access token will start with `token_`.
translation.Optionally add features to your subscrip: Optionally add features to your subscription
translation.Price by unit based on final tier reache: Price by unit based on final tier reached.
translation.Quantity to pay for in advance: Quantity to pay for in advance
translation.Save with yearly billing: Save up to {{percent}}% with yearly billing
translation.Saving with yearly billing: You are saving {{percent}}% with yearly billing
translation.Selected plan or associated price is mis: Selected plan or associated price is missing.
translation.Session expired. Please refresh and try: Session expired. Please refresh and try again.
translation.There was a problem retrieving your upco: There was a problem retrieving your upcoming invoice.
translation.There was a problem retrieving your invo: There was a problem retrieving your invoices.
translation.Tiers apply progressively as quantity in: Tiers apply progressively as quantity increases.
translation.Up to X units at $Y/unit + $Z/period: Up to {{X}} {{units}} at {{Y}} per {{unit}} plus {{Z}} per {{period}}
translation.You will retain access to your plan unti: You will retain access to your plan until the end of the billing period, on
